articles.author: Becky Upham
articles.title: Menopausal Symptoms and Cognitive Problems Connected, Study Says - Everyday Health
articles.description: Brain fog and memory trouble may be related to changing hormones and menopause, even if women experiencing symptoms do not realize there's a relationship.
articles.content: Although hot flashes are the quintessential symptom, there are several other menopause-related symptoms, such as brain fog or memory trouble, that women may not realize are connected to their changin… [+8281 chars]
